# deploygate Provider



## Example Usage

```terraform
terraform {
  required_providers {
    deploygate = {
      source = "fnaoto/deploygate"
    }
  }
}

provider "deploygate" {
  alias   = "organization"
  api_key = var.organization_api_key
}

variable "organization_api_key" {
  type = string
}

provider "deploygate" {
  alias   = "enterprise"
  api_key = var.enterprise_api_key
}

variable "enterprise_api_key" {
  type = string
}
```

## Schema

### Optional

- `api_key` (String, Sensitive)
